price: Na ni vyake Yeye hivi viendavyo baharini vilivyo undwa kama vilima.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walahu al-jawāri al-munshaātu fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
